revised_title: A Lumped Model for Seismic Source Dynamics
tldr: The authors propose a lumped mechanical model that represents a faulted lithosphere and study its dynamics. The model has an analytical solution and can investigate the effects of control parameters on the stress buildup and release phases. The model exhibits seismic or aseismic steady-state solutions depending on the control parameter values and provides insights into lithosphere dynamics and earthquake recurrence times.
